PerfectNetExp.abs: concretizing of subject matter 教材的具体化concupiscence 性欲concupiscible 由性欲引起的
堕落的状态是一种fault, 由色欲(concupiscence)刻画,统治了肉身,超出了人类的控制。 Adam的自由意志失去了uprightness,我们的自由意志则不能恢复。 知识不足以解决.

list.abs: despicable concupiscent and moist the flower of latter-day industry .卑劣的贪欲滋润了近代工业的花朵。
concupiscence 性欲concupiscible 由性欲引起的concur 同时发生
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(29) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... concupiscence 色欲 concupiscent 好色的 concur in 赞成.
concubine 因佩里亚尔, concupiscent 贪欲的, concupiscence 欲望

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from late Latin concupiscentia, from Latin concupiscent- 'beginning to desire', from the verb concupiscere, from con- (expressing intensive force) + cupere 'to desire'

auth_sentence.content: Wash your own spirit clean From all concupiscence terrene.

auth_sentence.content: There's a dame that arouses my concupiscence. But she looks very expensive.
